Item ID1277

The bronze sword is a low-level weapon made of bronze. It can be purchased from the Varrock Swordshop, or made at level 4 Smithing using 1 bronze bar, granting 12.5 experience.

A bronze sword is given to the player by Vannaka on Tutorial Island.

[[File:Bronze sword detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''bronze sword''' is a low-level [[weapon]] made of [[bronze equipment|bronze]]. It can be purchased from the [[Varrock Swordshop]], or made at level 4 [[Smithing]] using 1 [[bronze bar]], granting 12.5 experience.

A bronze sword is given to the player by [[Vannaka]] on [[Tutorial Island]].
